job description:
TEKsystems has partnered with a large customer in Minneapolis looking to add 3 Hadoop/Big Data Developer to their team. This project will involve migrating all online marketing data to their big data platform. Below are the core skills they are looking for.
  • Strong conceptual knowledge with Apache Spark and Scala. Must be able to articulate concepts within Spark
  • Experience with Hive, Map Reduce, HDFS, Oozie, Squoop, etc.
    • These positions are starting as 6+ month contracts with an opportunity to extend based on the needs of the project. Must sit on-site in Minneapolis. If you are interested in learning more about this opportunity, please apply with your updated resume!

    About TEKsystems:

    We're partners in transformation. We help clients activate ideas and solutions to take advantage of a new world of opportunity. We are a team of 80,000 strong, working with over 6,000 clients, including 80% of the Fortune 500, across North America, Europe and Asia. As an industry leader in Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application, we work with progressive leaders to drive change. That's the power of true partnership. TEKsystems is an Allegis Group company.
